Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Injured on 4/26/2015 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2016, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Struck out 15 batters against Boston on 4/1/2016...
Earned first career win on 4/23/2016...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/2017, off Alfonso Navarro (SLB)...
Injured on 4/27/2018 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Kansas City to Houston on 7/20/2018 (Going to KC: 1B Marcos Casto. Going to HOU: P Jose Mejia)...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 3/2/2019 (Going to HOU: P Guillermo Herrera, CF Michael Turner, P Francisco Hernandez, SS Stephen Corral. Going to CIN: P Rueben Goodin, P Jose Mejia)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 7/30/2019 (Going to PHI: 3B Edward Clinard, P Jose Mejia. Going to CIN: P Benjamin Berg)...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/13/2021 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 5/12/2022.
Released by Seattle on 5/22/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 5/26/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Released by Houston on 6/5/2022...
